about_the_game:
This EARTH 2160 - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into an unique and hazardous gaming universe.

EARTH 2160 Digital Deluxe Content includes:

  • Art-Pack consisting of
    • ED and LC Base Construction samples
    • LC and UCS Unit Construction samples
    • HiRes Render Artwork
    • Wireframe and In-Game render models
    • Full HD Wallpaper
    • Hi-Res Poster Art
  • EARTH 2160 SDK
  • Benchmark Tool
  • Sliding Puzzle Game (Windows only)
  • Making Of Video
  • Cheats and Strategy Guide [German only]

LightMap Samples of EARTH 2160

EARTH 2160 Digital Deluxe Content includes:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Ubuntu 15.04 or Steam OS
  • Intel/AMD Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • 1 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • 2.0 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Ubuntu 15.04 or Steam OS
  • Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 2.5 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Mac OSX 10.6
  • Intel Mac Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • 1 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • 2.0 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Mac OSX 10.6
  • Intel Mac Dual Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 2.5 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse

name: Earth 2160 - Digital Deluxe Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Intel/AMD Single Core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card
  • 2.5 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Intel/AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
  • 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX compatible sound card
  • 2.5 GB free disk space
  • Broad band Internet connection
  • Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: This EARTH 2160 - Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into an unique and hazardous gaming universe. The EARTH 2160 Digital Deluxe Content includes a rich Art-Pack, the EARTH 2160 SDK, EARTH 2160 Cheats, an Earth 2160 Sliding Puzzle Game and a Benchmark Tool.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
